typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		CustomerName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select CustomerID, FirstName+\' \'+ LastName as CustomerName from [SalesLT].[Customer]',
	format: 'query') ~> customer
source(output(
		ProductName as string,
		ProductID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select  Name as ProductName,ProductID from [SalesLT].[Product]',
	format: 'query') ~> Product
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		OrderNumber as string,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		CustomerID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select SalesOrderID,SalesOrderNumber as OrderNumber,OrderDate,CustomerID from [SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader]',
	format: 'query') ~> salesorderheader
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		ProductId as integer,
		TotalWorthOfSales as decimal(38,6)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select SalesOrderID,ProductId,LineTotal as TotalWorthOfSales from [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail]',
	format: 'query') ~> salesorderdetail
Product, salesorderdetail join(Product@ProductID == salesorderdetail@ProductId,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
salesorderheader, Join1 join(salesorderdetail@SalesOrderID == salesorderheader@SalesOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
customer, Join2 join(customer@CustomerID == salesorderheader@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerName,
		OrderNumber,
		OrderDate,
		ProductName,
		TotalWorthOfSales
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
RemoveColumns1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
